LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Drug.label: eleth
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Drug.descri: Because I'm addicted to Eleth. Eleth should be taken on a regular basis.
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.label: helianto light drug
LanguageData.Chemical_Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.descrip: In order for Miho not to have animalistic sensations, it is necessary to periodically take a drug made from helianto.
